Text:
The only thing I could say it could improve on is bookmarked chapters. It really is a great copy, though. 

Cheers! My favourite book is now on my kindle!
I do not know how to open it...it says file type unknown..can anybody help me...??
abhipatu: This is a .prc file for PDA devices (eBook reader etc...). You can download "XnView" to open it on your computer.
Well I just tried it in XnView and this .prc file won't load. Maybe the file is damaged or maybe I need a different viewer...

flawless torrent, great book.
I used Mobipocket Reader Desktop to read the book, however there are a bunch of other software you could use instead.
Thanks swumpster, it works in Mobipocket. I don't know why I didn't see that in the description before.
Thanks, guys.  I got tired of downloading the book only to have it filled with errors so this was a true mission for me.  I really appreciate the comments.

I love the torrent!  Thanks so much!  Just a quick correction: on page 60, it says, "No.  It was supposed to he, but the arrangements got all screwed up."  it should have a "be" instead of a "he".  Obviously its not a big deal, and its a great torrent otherwise.
Thanks for the correction. I'm anal about this stuff.  I'll upload the corrected version with chapter bookmarks shortly.
The final proof is up.  The Catcher In The Rye (Final Proof).  Added chapter bookmarks and corrected the one typo.
wouldnt you just be able to open it in word?

Good. If you want to read it on a Nook, though, you're going to have to convert it to something like EPUB. You can use a program called Calibre to do this, and i think it also converts it to and from any other ebook format.

Thanks!
